name: romano
content:
Romano noun
(CHEESE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] (also Romano cheese, romano cheese, uk us) a type of hard Italian cheese made from cow's milk: A strong hard cheese such as Parmesan or Romano is great on pasta dishes. She brought in a plate of tortellini with a little romano grated on top. I did not have any romano cheese so I used parmesan instead.
More examplesFewer examplesShe started by mixing fresh breadcrumbs with grated Romano and parsley.I usually put some grated Romano on the table in case my guests want to add some more.

Romano noun
(PEPPER)
[ C ] a long, thin, red pepper (= a vegetable with a hollow centre) with a sweet taste: You can use ordinary sweet peppers for this, but I prefer to use Romanos. The roasted Romano peppers add a little sweetness to the soup.

of or connected with Rome or Romans: a tutor in Romano-British history
